attributes.action: The UK government should condemn US  immigration policy as discriminatory.
attributes.additional_details: Refugees are some of the world's most vulnerable people and every nation should work to protect them, regardless of the country they come from.
attributes.background: The US government's decision to deny entry to refugees on the basis of their nationality and religion is blatant discrimination that violates the UN 1951 Refugee Convention, as well as common decency.
